title: China’s PLA unveils robot that mimics soldiers’ combat moves
description: Showcased by China's People's Liberation Army, the robot can match every move of soldiers using artificial intelligence power.
content:
China has showcased its new type of military robot during a recent event. The robot is reportedly capable of matching every move of soldiers using artificial intelligence.

title: Brazil Potash Initiates Artificial Intelligence Powered X-Ray Ore Sorting Trial as Technology Shows High Potential to Substantially Reduce Costs
description: Unleashing Artificial Intelligence’s power in the mining process could dramatically reduce costs and increase revenues. A.I. has the power to determine ore from waste rock, saving time and money.AI deployed at scale can achieve mining efficiencies that have been impossible with traditional equipment. MANAUS, Brazil, Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brazil Potash Corp. ('Brazil Potash' or the 'Company') (NYSE-American: GRO), a mineral exploration and development company with a critical mineral potash agriculture project, the Autazes Project, today announced the initiation of an Artificial Intelligence Optical Ore Sorting trial to evaluate underground pre-concentration technology that could significantly enhance project economics and operational efficiency.
content:
Unleashing Artificial Intelligence’s power in the mining process could dramatically reduce costs and increase revenues.
A.I. has the power to determine ore from waste rock, saving time and money.

title: Viral post on H1-B visa sponsorship triggers buzz at IIT-Delhi amid placement season
description: A US-based artificial intelligence recruitment firm has created a buzz around IIT-Delhi after a social media post about its bold hoardings on H1-B visa sponsorship went viral on social media. So companies offering sponsorship is a huge thing for us, he said.Another student, reacting to the overall mood on campus, said the viral hoarding has added to the emotions of placement time.

title: Inuvo Launches Ranger: AI Tool for Ad Quality and Compliance
description: LITTLE ROCK, Ark., Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Inuvo, Inc. (NYSE American: INUV), a leading provider of artificial intelligence AdTech solutions, today announced the launch of Ranger, an advanced quality assurance and compliance feature within its Campsight system. Campsight is Inuvo’s integrated environment for managing content, campaigns, and regulatory oversight.

title: Excelsior Sciences raises $95 million to speed small molecule drug development using AI
description: Excelsior Sciences said on Wednesday it has raised $95 million to develop technology that uses machines and artificial intelligence to accelerate the development and testing of small molecules, aiming to cut years off drug discovery timelines.
